title: LoL Launcher
body: Alright...my league of legends will not launch no matter what I do. Can someone help me get back to Killin Vaynes and taking Names???

replies.body:
The League client can often get blocked from launching if it hasn't been assigned proper system permissions by your operating system. League interacts with a lot of files and software packages that aren't in the League directory, so it needs certain permissions to run properly. The guide that *Rineyy* linked goes over the most common solutions for this. 

If after working through that guide, you still have issues, let me know.

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg

Open up "my computer" and go to C: then riot games. You should see like 5 folders, a lockfile and 2 launchers. Delete all 5 folders then run LOL normally. It should open up the launcher and update your client and you will be able to play all good again.
